title: Repainter v1.2.0 brings new Material You theme styles for unrooted Android 13 and OneUI 4.x devices
content:
We’ve seen Android theming change and grow over a long period of time, starting with custom overlays via Substratum and now moving on to Android 12‘s Material You wallpaper-based theme engine (codenamed “monet”). Google recently published the resources and libraries on the dynamic theming component of Material You, too, though prior to its publication, Google’s implementation

The post Repainter v1.2.0 brings new Material You theme styles for unrooted Android 13 and OneUI 4.x devices appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Repainter v1.2.0 brings new Material You theme styles for unrooted Android 13 and OneUi 4.x devices, and you can learn about them here.
